summary: The contractors who run the National Nuclear Security Administration’s 8 sites—including its weapons plants and labs—track and report costs in different ways. However, Congress needs comparable cost information to provide oversight and to make budget decisions across these sites. NNSA is continuing to make progress on implementing a common financial reporting system for its contractors. We found NNSA could do more to ensure that the...
title: National Nuclear Security Administration: Additional Verification Checks Could Improve the Accuracy and Consistency of Reported Financial Data
